title: BASANT BAHAR BY ICON PROPERTIES
detail: Basant Bahar presents an ideal fusion of elegance and comfort in its 3 BHK residences. These thoughtfully designed homes offer spacious living areas with modern finishes, ensuring a refined lifestyle. Each unit is crafted to provide a perfect balance of functionality and style, with high-quality materials and contemporary design elements. Basant Bahar’s focus on creating inviting and practical living spaces makes it a standout choice for those seeking a blend of sophistication and practicality in their new home.
possession:
12 Floors +
Basement parking (Minimum 2 car parks for each apartment)
developer_detail: Icon Properties has a reputation for using cutting-edge technology, high-quality materials, and skilled professionals to deliver cost-effective homes with top-notch amenities. Our projects are known for their blend of aesthetics and functionality, catering to both elite desires and middle-class housing needs. Over the years, Icon Properties has developed a unique style that distinguishes all of our projects.
city_description: Discover the vibrant heart of Pune in Erandwane, a sought-after residential haven with a rich cultural heritage. Enjoy unparalleled convenience with renowned educational institutions, bustling commercial centers, and serene green spaces at your doorstep. Experience the perfect blend of tradition and modernity in this well-connected and thriving locale. Your ideal home awaits in Erandwane.
